Label: Name
Notes: locked if DSP is running
Hover help text in the status bar: Name of the current show.

Label: Location
Notes: locked if DSP is running
Hover help text in the status bar: Location of the current show.

Label: Input Channels
Notes: locked if DSP is running
Hover help text in the status bar: Number of Input Channels.

Label: Output Channels
Notes: locked if DSP is running
Hover help text in the status bar: Number of Output Channels.

Label: Reverb Channels
Notes: locked if DSP is running
Hover help text in the status bar: Number of Reverb Channels.

Label: Audio Interface and Patching Window
Notes: locked if DSP is running. Open Audio Patching window
Hover help text in the status bar: Open patching window to route Input and Output channels to the Audio Interface.

Label: Processing
enum: Click to start DSP ; DSP running
Notes: locks all parameters of the I/O section and starts the DSP when on. 2 second press to turn off
Hover help text in the status bar: Lock all I/O parameters and start the DSP. Long press to stop the DSP.

Label: Stage Shape
Notes: Defines stage geometry
Hover help text in the status bar: Stage shape: Box (rectangular), Cylinder (circular footprint), or Dome (partial sphere).

Label: Stage Width
Notes: Visible when Shape=Box
Hover help text in the status bar: Width of the stage in meters (Box shape only).

Label: Stage Depth
Notes: Visible when Shape=Box
Hover help text in the status bar: Depth of the stage in meters (Box shape only).

Label: Stage Height
Notes: Visible when Shape=Box or Cylinder
Hover help text in the status bar: Height of the stage in meters (Box and Cylinder shapes).

Label: Stage Diameter
Notes: Visible when Shape=Cylinder or Dome
Hover help text in the status bar: Diameter of the stage in meters (Cylinder and Dome shapes).

Label: Dome Elevation
Notes: Visible when Shape=Dome
Hover help text in the status bar: Dome elevation angle: 180° = hemisphere, 360° = full sphere.

Label: Origin Width
Notes: Center-referenced coordinate system
Hover help text in the status bar: Origin X offset from stage center (0 = centered, negative = left).

Label: Origin Depth
Notes: Center-referenced coordinate system
Hover help text in the status bar: Origin Y offset from stage center (0 = centered, negative = front/downstage).

Label: Origin Height
Notes: Center-referenced coordinate system
Hover help text in the status bar: Origin Z offset from floor (0 = floor level, positive = above floor).

Label: Speed of Sound
Notes: <Speed of sound> = 331.3 + 0.606 � <Temperature> update if Temperature is updated
Hover help text in the status bar: Speed of Sound (related to the temperature).

Label: Temperature
Notes: <Temperature> = (<Speed of sound> - 331.3) / 0.606) update if Speed of Sound is updated
Hover help text in the status bar: Temperature (gives the Speed of Sound).

Label: Master Level
Hover help text in the status bar: Master Level (affects all outputs).

Label: System Latency
Hover help text in the status bar: Total latency of the system (Mixing board & Computer) / Specific Input and Output Latency/Delay can be set in the respective Input and Output settings.

Label: Haas Effect
Hover help text in the status bar: Hass Effect to apply to the system. Will take into account the Latency Compensations (System, Input and Output).

Label: Current IPv4
Notes: not editable
Hover help text in the status bar: IP address of the Processor.

Label: UDP Port
Hover help text in the status bar: UDP Recieve Port of the Processor.

Label: TCP Port
Hover help text in the status bar: TCP Recieve Port of the Processor.

Label: Open Log Window
Notes: open Network Logging window
Hover help text in the status bar: Open Network Logging window.

Label: Add Target/Server
Notes: At the end of the empty row after all targets (max 6 targets) Add a row for a new target.
Hover help text in the status bar: Add new network target.

Label: Target/Server Name
Notes: For each target/server (up to 6 targets/servers)
Hover help text in the status bar: Network Target Name.

Label: Target/Server Data Mode
Notes: For each target/server (up to 6 targets/servers)
Hover help text in the status bar: Select UDP or TCP data transmission (OSC is UDP by default).

Label: Target/Server IPv4
Notes: For each target/server (up to 6 targets/servers)
Hover help text in the status bar: IP Address of the Target (use 127.0.0.1 for local host).

Label: Target/Server Port
Notes: For each target/server (up to 6 targets/servers)
Hover help text in the status bar: Transmit Port for this Target.

Label: Target/Server Rx Enable
Notes: For each target/server (up to 6 targets/servers)
Hover help text in the status bar: Enable or Disable Data Reception.

Label: Target/Server Tx Enable
Notes: For each target/server (up to 6 targets/servers)
Hover help text in the status bar: Enable or Disable Data Transmission.

Label: Target/Server Protocol
Notes: For each target/server (up to 6 targets/servers)
Hover help text in the status bar: Select the Protocol for this Target (OSC; REMOTE for the Remote Control application; ADM-OSC)

Label: Remove Target/Server
Notes: For each target/server (up to 6 targets/servers). At the end of the row in the same column as the �Add target/server� of the last row
Hover help text in the status bar: Delete this Network Target.

Label: Find My Remote
Notes: Send OSC /findDevice with findDevicePassword
Hover help text in the status bar: Make your Remote Flash and Buzz to Find it.

Label: Password
Hover help text in the status bar: Password for Find My Remote

Label: ADM-OSC Offset X
Notes: Greyed out but editable if no ADM-OSC target/server present
Hover help text in the status bar: Offset Tracking X Coordinate

Label: ADM-OSC Offset Y
Notes: Greyed out but editable if no ADM-OSC target/server present
Hover help text in the status bar: Offset Tracking Y Coordinate

Label: ADM-OSC Offset Z
Notes: Greyed out but editable if no ADM-OSC target/server present
Hover help text in the status bar: Offset Tracking Z Coordinate

Label: ADM-OSC Scale X
Notes: Greyed out but editable if no ADM-OSC target/server present
Hover help text in the status bar: Scale Tracking X Coordinate

Label: ADM-OSC Scale Y
Notes: Greyed out but editable if no ADM-OSC target/server present
Hover help text in the status bar: Scale Tracking Y Coordinate

Label: ADM-OSC Scale Z
Notes: Greyed out but editable if no ADM-OSC target/server present
Hover help text in the status bar: Scale Tracking Z Coordinate

Label: ADM-OSC Flip X
Notes: Greyed out but editable if no ADM-OSC target/server present
Hover help text in the status bar: Invert Axis of Tracking X Coordinate

Label: ADM-OSC Flip Y
Notes: Greyed out but editable if no ADM-OSC target/server present
Hover help text in the status bar: Invert Axis of Tracking Y Coordinate

Label: ADM-OSC Flip Z
Notes: Greyed out but editable if no ADM-OSC target/server present
Hover help text in the status bar: Invert Axis of Tracking Z Coordinate

Label: Tracking Enabled
Hover help text in the status bar: Enable or Disable Incoming Tracking data processing.

Label: Tracking Protocol
Notes: Greyed out but editable if trackingEnabled == 0
Hover help text in the status bar: Select the type of Tracking Protocol.

Label: Tracking Rx Port
Notes: Greyed out but editable if trackingEnabled == 0
Hover help text in the status bar: Specify the Port to receive Tracking data.

Label: Tracking Offset X
Notes: Greyed out but editable if trackingEnabled == 0
Hover help text in the status bar: Offset Tracking X Coordinate

Label: Tracking Offset Y
Notes: Greyed out but editable if trackingEnabled == 0
Hover help text in the status bar: Offset Tracking Y Coordinate

Label: Tracking Offset Z
Notes: Greyed out but editable if trackingEnabled == 0
Hover help text in the status bar: Offset Tracking Z Coordinate

Label: Tracking Scale X
Notes: Greyed out but editable if trackingEnabled == 0
Hover help text in the status bar: Scale Tracking X Coordinate

Label: Tracking Scale Y
Notes: Greyed out but editable if trackingEnabled == 0
Hover help text in the status bar: Scale Tracking Y Coordinate

Label: Tracking Scale Z
Notes: Greyed out but editable if trackingEnabled == 0
Hover help text in the status bar: Scale Tracking Z Coordinate

Label: Tracking Flip X
Notes: Greyed out but editable if trackingEnabled == 0
Hover help text in the status bar: Invert Axis of Tracking X Coordinate

Label: Tracking Flip Y
Notes: Greyed out but editable if trackingEnabled == 0
Hover help text in the status bar: Invert Axis of Tracking Y Coordinate

Label: Tracking Flip Z
Notes: Greyed out but editable if trackingEnabled == 0
Hover help text in the status bar: Invert Axis of Tracking Z Coordinate

Label: Select Project Folder
Notes: Open project folder selector where to store files
Hover help text in the status bar: Select the Location of the Current Project Folder where to store files.

Label: Store Complete Configuration
Notes: Store Complete Configuration to files (overwrite confirmation)
Hover help text in the status bar: Store Complete Configuration to files (overwrite with confirmation)

Label: Reload Complete Configuration
Notes: Reload Complete Configuration from files (confirmation)
Hover help text in the status bar: Reload Complete Configuration from files (with confirmation)

Label: Reload Complete Config. Backup
Notes: Reload Complete Configuration from backup files (confirmation)
Hover help text in the status bar: Reload Complete Configuration from backup files (with confirmation)

Label: Store System Configuration
Notes: Store System Configuration to file (overwrite confirmation) including audio interface and patch
Hover help text in the status bar: Store System Configuration to file (overwrite with confirmation)

Label: Reload System Configuration
Notes: Reload System Configuration from file (confirmation) including audio interface and patch
Hover help text in the status bar: Reload System Configuration from file (with confirmation)

Label: Reload System Config. Backup
Notes: Reload System Configuration from backup file (confirmation) including audio interface and patch
Hover help text in the status bar: Reload System Configuration from backup file (with confirmation)

Label: Import System Configuration
Notes: Store System Configuration to file (with file explorer window)
Hover help text in the status bar: Store System Configuration to file (with file explorer window)

Label: Export System Configuration
Notes: Reload System Configuration from file (with file explorer window)
Hover help text in the status bar: Reload System Configuration from file (with file explorer window)
